${modID}:SatansGrudge.NAME: Satan's Grudge
${modID}:SatansGrudge.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, lose 2 HP and gain as much ${modID}:Begrudged whenever a card is Exhausted.

${modID}:Clog.NAME: Clog
${modID}:Clog.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL While in hand, whenever a card is discarded, shuffle a *Clog into your draw pile.

${modID}:BadCode.NAME: Bad Code
${modID}:BadCode.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, Channel 1 ${modID}:Brick.

${modID}:TheBigSad.NAME: The Big Sad
${modID}:TheBigSad.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, enter ${modID}:Depression and Exhaust. NL Whenever you enter Wrath, ${modID}:Exhume this card and shuffle it into your draw pile.

${modID}:CultistMicrophone.NAME: Cultist Microphone
${modID}:CultistMicrophone.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, you feel talkative.

${modID}:DeadOff.NAME: Dead Off
${modID}:DeadOff.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, move all hermit:Dead_On cards to the left side of your hand.

${modID}:SplitCrap.NAME: Split: Crap
${modID}:SplitCrap.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, slimeboundmod:Split into a ${modID}:Crap_Slime.

${modID}:BlackDiamond.NAME: Black Diamond
${modID}:BlackDiamond.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. guardianmod:Gem. NL When you draw this card, increase each of your debuffs by 1. NL This card cannot be Exhausted.
${modID}:BlackDiamond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, increase each of your debuffs by 1.
${modID}:BlackDiamond.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, increase each of your debuffs by 1.

${modID}:FaultyGyroscope.NAME: Faulty Gyroscope
${modID}:FaultyGyroscope.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, hexamod:Advance after you hexamod:Retract and hexamod:Retract after you hexamod:Advance.

${modID}:Misinput.NAME: Misinput
${modID}:Misinput.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, lose ALL your Vigor and champ:Counter.

${modID}:CoconutJPG.NAME: Coconut.jpg
${modID}:CoconutJPG.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, bronze:Encode it.

${modID}:LichsSoul.NAME: Lich's Soul
${modID}:LichsSoul.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, lose 1 collector:Reserve. NL This card cannot be Exhausted.

${modID}:BathroomBreak.NAME: Bathroom Break
${modID}:BathroomBreak.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, your current Gremlin leaves the battle.

${modID}:Eyepatch.NAME: Eyepatch
${modID}:Eyepatch.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, cards that are sneckomod:Muddled can't decrease in cost.

${modID}:AmateurHour.NAME: Amateur Hour
${modID}:AmateurHour.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, your Stance is ignored.

${modID}:FourthRateDeck.NAME: 4th Rate Deck
${modID}:FourthRateDeck.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, cards from the Pack you have the most cards from are Unplayable.

${modID}:GrizzlyBear.NAME: Grizzly Bear
${modID}:GrizzlyBear.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, all fishing:Fish in hand are instantly destroyed.

${modID}:AnkleMonitor.NAME: Ankle Monitor
${modID}:AnkleMonitor.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Retain. Unplayable. NL While in hand, you cannot thethorton:Run.

${modID}:GumOnShoe.NAME: Gum on Shoe
${modID}:GumOnShoe.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in your deck, you gain 50% less Gold.

${modID}:ForcedFullness.NAME: Forced Fullness
${modID}:ForcedFullness.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Remove all your thevacant:Gems. NL While in hand, you cannot be thevacant:Hollow.

${modID}:Butterfingers.NAME: Butterfingers
${modID}:Butterfingers.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, Ethereal cards automatically discard.

${modID}:PainfulLogistics.NAME: Painful Logistics
${modID}:PainfulLogistics.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Shuffle a Jam into your draw pile. NL While in hand, whenever you would bladegunner:Load ALL, bladegunner:Load 1 instead.

${modID}:Purism.NAME: Purism
${modID}:Purism.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL While in hand, lose 1 HP whenever you play a card that is changed from its vanilla counterpart.

${modID}:ShareTheLove.NAME: Share The Love
${modID}:ShareTheLove.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, temporary buffs and *Plated *Armor are also given to the enemy.

${modID}:ScourgeOfTheCaribbean.NAME: Scourge of the Caribbean
${modID}:ScourgeOfTheCaribbean.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, your most valuable card in hand gains Fleeting for the turn.

${modID}:Trespasser.NAME: Trespasser
${modID}:Trespasser.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, a *Gremlin *Thief with -8 Strength joins the battle.
